Title: Relates to the elimination of bail and providing for pretrial detention; repealer
Summary: Provides for the elimination of cash bail and provides for pretrial detention; directs the office of court administration to prepare an annual report on pretrial release and detention outcomes.
LawCode: Rpld ยง500.10 subs 21 & 22, ยง510.10 subs 3 - 5, Art 520, ยง530.60, amd CP L, generally; rpld Art 68, Ins L; amd ยง216, Judy L
